price: Ergasii ishee keessatti hin du'u; hin jiraatus.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
